headline.main: China Stocks Retreat Despite New Moves to Stave Off Crash
headline.print_headline: China Stocks Retreat Despite New Moves to Stave Off Crash

docs.snippet: Chinese stocks fell on Thursday in another highly volatile session even as regulators intensified efforts to put a floor under the sliding market....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chinese stocks fell on Thursday in another highly volatile session even as regulators intensified efforts to put a floor under the sliding market.

headline.main: Family Sues Over Southern California College Hazing Death
headline.print_headline: Family Sues Over Southern California College Hazing Death

docs.snippet: The family of a southern California university student who died on a grueling hike during an initiation rite for a fraternity sued officials from the college and the fraternity on Wednesday, accusing them of negligence....
docs.lead_paragraph: The family of a southern California university student who died on a grueling hike during an initiation rite for a fraternity sued officials from the college and the fraternity on Wednesday, accusing them of negligence.

headline.main: Jeonbuk Coach Lee Gets 200th Win in Korea
headline.print_headline: Jeonbuk Coach Lee Gets 200th Win in Korea

docs.snippet: Jeonbuk coach Choi Kang-hee picked up his 200th career K League win on Wednesday after a double from veteran striker Lee Dong-guk gave the South Korean leaders a 2-1 win over Busan....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jeonbuk coach Choi Kang-hee picked up his 200th career K League win on Wednesday after a double from veteran striker Lee Dong-guk gave the South Korean leaders a 2-1 win over Busan.

headline.main: Bus Falls Off Bridge, Killing 10 South Koreans
headline.print_headline: Bus Falls Off Bridge, Killing 10 South Koreans

docs.snippet: A bus carrying a group of South Koreans fell off a highway bridge in northeastern China, killing 10 passengers and the Chinese driver, officials said Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A bus carrying a group of South Koreans fell off a highway bridge in northeastern China, killing 10 passengers and the Chinese driver, officials said Thursday.

headline.main: Carrasco Loses No-Hitter With 1 Strike to Go in 9th vs Rays
headline.print_headline: Carrasco Loses No-Hitter With 1 Strike to Go in 9th vs Rays

docs.snippet: Carlos Carrasco came within one strike of throwing the Cleveland Indians' first no-hitter since 1981 on Wednesday night, giving up an RBI single to Joey Butler over leaping second baseman Jason Kipnis' glove in an 8-1 victory over the Tampa Bay Ra...
docs.lead_paragraph: Carlos Carrasco came within one strike of throwing the Cleveland Indians' first no-hitter since 1981 on Wednesday night, giving up an RBI single to Joey Butler over leaping second baseman Jason Kipnis' glove in an 8-1 victory over the Tampa Bay Rays.

headline.main: Australia Paceman Harris a Doubt for First Ashes Test
headline.print_headline: Australia Paceman Harris a Doubt for First Ashes Test

docs.snippet: Australia's selectors may be spared the headache of choosing who to leave out of the team's pace bowling unit for the first Ashes test against England after Ryan Harris was withdrawn from a warmup match due to knee soreness....
docs.lead_paragraph: Australia's selectors may be spared the headache of choosing who to leave out of the team's pace bowling unit for the first Ashes test against England after Ryan Harris was withdrawn from a warmup match due to knee soreness.

headline.main: Bour Homers in 9th to Help Marlins Beat Giants 6-5
headline.print_headline: Bour Homers in 9th to Help Marlins Beat Giants 6-5

docs.snippet: Justin Bour hit a three-run homer with no outs in the ninth inning, and the Miami Marlins overcame three errors and a flurry of double-play grounders to rally past the San Francisco Giants 6-5 on Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Justin Bour hit a three-run homer with no outs in the ninth inning, and the Miami Marlins overcame three errors and a flurry of double-play grounders to rally past the San Francisco Giants 6-5 on Wednesday night.

headline.main: Californians Cut Water Use in May, Ahead of Mandatory Reductions
headline.print_headline: Californians Cut Water Use in May, Ahead of Mandatory Reductions

docs.snippet: California residents, in a boost for efforts to deal with a devastating four-year drought, cut water use by nearly 29 percent in May to score the biggest reduction since the state governor in early 2014 called for voluntary cutbacks, officials sai...
docs.lead_paragraph: California residents, in a boost for efforts to deal with a devastating four-year drought, cut water use by nearly 29 percent in May to score the biggest reduction since the state governor in early 2014 called for voluntary cutbacks, officials said on Wednesday.
